MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Sealand Road and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30PM to remove generators and finalise repairs on the overhead line network . Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30PM on the 15th April 2021
